overview: Chris is the current CEO and Co-Founder of OrderUp. Since OrderUps inception, Chris has been a key architect behind the company’s business model, distribution strategy, stakeholder relations, product development, and financial modeling. Additionally, he is responsible for evaluating future acquisitions and partner relations. Chris is also heavily involved in the day-to-day operations and manages sales and marketing efforts in company owned markets, which has allowed him to successfully train and support franchisees in all aspects of the business model. Chris attended Pennsylvania State University, where he earned a B.S. in Finance. He was recently recognized as the Penn State University, Bischoff Entrepreneur-in-Residence (EIR).
